title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: 820 4924 no display on LCD, machine does have display via HDMI out. EDP_BKLT_EN, LCD_PSR_EN, &  EDP_PANEL_PWR all missing. I do have PP3V3_S0_PCH_GPIO going into U8330.

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message:
eDP requires some voltage presence in order to put high (2.5V) LCD_HPD_CONN signal, if connected of course.
Do you get something at pin5 of J8300?
Or pins 28-30 few seconds when the board starts...

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: Pins 28-30 get 5.15v, Pin 5 gets .040v for a few seconds when the board starts, then drop to 0v.

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: Known good LCD? Correct 2015 model LCD used? History?

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: Yes confirmed correct 2015 known good working screen has been tested, still no display. This board looks clean as a whistle, as far as I know the display just randomly stopped working.

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: The 5V on pins 28-30 suggest that the LCD is recognized if the 5V does not drop off again. Are you sure this is not just a backlight issue?

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: Yes I'm sure, I checked with high power led flash light that I always use to check for back light, plus 0v on L8300

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: You just said there was 5V on pins 28-30, those are connected to L8300. What is it now? 5V for a second then dropping off? Recheck

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: Yes the 5v is only present for a few seconds, then drops to, and stays at 0v. Sorry maybe I wrote my original answer poorly.

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message:
So the LCD is not recognized then. I assume you did a PRAM reset to be sure?

Check continuity for all connector pins to the end of a separate LCD cable to check if connector is ok. Also inspect for knocked off parts around LCD connector on top and bottom of board. This problem does usually not "just" happen...

Are you absolutely 100% sure you have a known good 2015 model assembly nothing else works properly.

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: P RAM reset was tried a few times. I no missing components as far as I can see, and I'm definitely testing with a 2015 LCD. Will a cable from a 2012 retina machine work for testing?

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: Yeah all the cables are the same.

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: Continuity from the pins to the end of the cable is good, fuck this board.

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message: Diode mode on C8320 and friends on CPU side. Also check continuity from the other side to the LCD connector.

title: 820 4924 no internal display
message:
Diode mode measurements for the following 
C8320 Pin 1 .287v  Pin 2 OL
L8300 .530v
C8311 .530v
I have continuity starting at both connector side and cable side. Also reflowed all connector pins to make sure I didn't have cold joint, no change.
